text: @SecAzar @POTUS Alex Azar another one of serial liar Trumps corrupt cabinet members. This guy is responsible for firing Dr. Rick Bright who chose to tell the Truth about the Covid-19 virus while Azar and Trump lied and delayed the production of necessary medical equipment!
